vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.24.11;
son of: Jozadak (H3136)
§ Jeshua = "he is saved"
n pr m
1) son of Nun of the tribe of Ephraim and successor to Moses as the leader of the children of Israel; led the conquest of Canaan
2) son of Jehozadak and high priest after the restoration
3) a priest in the time of David who had charge of the 9th course
4) a Levite in the reign of Hezekiah
5) head of a Levitical house which returned from captivity in Babylon
6) father of a builder of the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
n pr loc
7) a town in southern Judah reinhabited by the people of Judah after the return from captivity
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   sacerdote; en tiempos del rey David; (b)   sacerdote; en tiempos de Ezequías; (c)   jefe de familia; post exílico; (d)   varios hombres; tribu de Leví; post exílico; (e) יְהוֹשׁוּע   sumo sacerdote; hijo de Josadac; post exílico; (f)   padre de Éser, jefe de Mispá; (g) יְהוֹשׁוּע ,הוֹשֵׁע   hijo de Nun; asistente de Moisés; (h)   ciudad; territorio de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶書亞 这个字在原文的意思是 "耶和華是被拯救"
陽性專有名詞 人名
1) 以法蓮支派嫩的兒子, 為以色列子民的領袖和摩西的繼承人; 帶領奪取迦南地之人 (尼 8:17)
2) 約薩答之子, (以色列人從波斯)歸回後的大祭司 (拉 3:2,8)
3) 大衛王時負責帶領第九班祭祀事奉的祭司 (代上 24:11)
4) 利未家族的名字 #拉 2:40,3:9; 尼 7:43,8:7,9:4,5,10:10,12:8|
5) 利未家族的首字 #代下 31:15; 拉 8:33; 尼 12:24|
6) 尼希米時一位協助耶路撒冷城牆重建工程者的父親 #尼 3:19|
7) 一個猶大家族名字 #拉 2:6; 尼 7:11|, 可能與 (6) 同
專有名詞 地名
7) 在猶大南部的一個城鎮, 是由被擄之地回歸的一部分猶大人所居住的地方 #尼 11:26|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
耶书亚 这个字在原文的意思是 "耶和华是被拯救"
阳性专有名词 人名
1) 以法莲支派嫩的儿子, 为以色列子民的领袖和摩西的继承人; 带领夺取迦南地之人 (尼 8:17)
2) 约萨答之子, (以色列人从波斯)归回后的大祭司 (拉 3:2,8)
3) 大卫王时负责带领第九班祭祀事奉的祭司 (代上 24:11)
4) 利未家族的名字 #拉 2:40,3:9; 尼 7:43,8:7,9:4,5,10:10,12:8|
5) 利未家族的首字 #代下 31:15; 拉 8:33; 尼 12:24|
6) 尼希米时一位协助耶路撒冷城墙重建工程者的父亲 #尼 3:19|
7) 一个犹大家族名字 #拉 2:6; 尼 7:11|, 可能与 (6) 同
专有名词 地名
7) 在犹大南部的一个城镇, 是由被掳之地回归的一部分犹大人所居住的地方 #尼 11:26|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.31.15
§ Jeshua = "he is saved"
n pr m
1) son of Nun of the tribe of Ephraim and successor to Moses as the leader of the children of Israel; led the conquest of Canaan
2) son of Jehozadak and high priest after the restoration
3) a priest in the time of David who had charge of the 9th course
4) a Levite in the reign of Hezekiah
5) head of a Levitical house which returned from captivity in Babylon
6) father of a builder of the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
n pr loc
7) a town in southern Judah reinhabited by the people of Judah after the return from captivity

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness & Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Exo.17.9;
son of: Nun (H5126); also called Hoshea (KJV: Oshea) at Num.13.8; Jeshua at Neh.8.17;
Another name of ye.ho.shu.a (יְהוֹשׁוּעַ "Joshua" H3091)
§ Jeshua = "he is saved"
n pr m
1) son of Nun of the tribe of Ephraim and successor to Moses as the leader of the children of Israel; led the conquest of Canaan
2) son of Jehozadak and high priest after the restoration
3) a priest in the time of David who had charge of the 9th course
4) a Levite in the reign of Hezekiah
5) head of a Levitical house which returned from captivity in Babylon
6) father of a builder of the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
n pr loc
7) a town in southern Judah reinhabited by the people of Judah after the return from captivity

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.2;
son of: Jehozadak (H3087);
father of: Joiakim (H3113); also called Jeshua at Ezr.2.2; 3.2,8; 4.3; 5.2; 1x12.1,7,10,26;
Another name of ye.ho.shu.a (יְהוֹשׁוּעַ "Joshua" H3091J)
§ Jeshua = "he is saved"
n pr m
1) son of Nun of the tribe of Ephraim and successor to Moses as the leader of the children of Israel; led the conquest of Canaan
2) son of Jehozadak and high priest after the restoration
3) a priest in the time of David who had charge of the 9th course
4) a Levite in the reign of Hezekiah
5) head of a Levitical house which returned from captivity in Babylon
6) father of a builder of the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
n pr loc
7) a town in southern Judah reinhabited by the people of Judah after the return from captivity
